extraction_metadata.notes: CRITICAL: ETH wallet 0xc0818387a81Bea766C9038F961C1ae7b2342106b extracted. DANGEROUS OPERATION - scammers attempted identity theft (SSN, IDme credentials) and used threatening messages. Romance → investment funnel with Telegram group. Nancy became 'increasingly aggressive' - unusual escalation pattern.

chain_of_thought.step_1_initial_contact: Mandy approached victim online with romantic interest
chain_of_thought.step_2_trust_building: Extended conversation, Mandy shared crypto success story
chain_of_thought.step_3_group_introduction: Introduced to Telegram group 'Binary Trading Solutions' led by Nancy
chain_of_thought.step_4_platform_direction: Nancy directed victim to GlobalTek Forex Trading
chain_of_thought.step_5_extraction_loop: Perpetual fee demands blocking every withdrawal attempt
chain_of_thought.step_6_identity_theft: Nancy became aggressive, demanded SSN and IDme login credentials
